In opera or commedia dell'arte, a prima donna is the leading female singer in the 
company, the person to whom the prime roles would be given. The prima donna 
was normally, but not necessarily, a soprano. The corresponding term for the 
male lead (almost always a tenor) is primo ... This woman, usually the principal
